pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fetch and plot credit easing policy tool data. // Forms queries to submit to the Cleveland Federal Reserve Bank web site's credit easing policy tools data site. Provides various query functions according to the easing data desired. By default the download includes easing tool weekly time series data starting January 2007. The functions return a class of type easing which contains a list of items related to the query and its graphical presentation. The list includes the time series data as an xts object. The package provides two lattice time series plots to render the data in a manner similar to the bank's own presentation.
